name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course aims to use latest and current news as teaching materials to help students build their vocabulary, familiarize themselves with basic sentence patterns and eventually develop their comprehension abilities. News reports suitable for basic-level students will be selected from newspapers or news magazines (e.g. bilingual news from China Post and Taipei Times) and online news websites (e.g. VOA Special English) to effectively enhance students’ fundamental reading skills.
schedule:
Week 1  Introduction
Week 2  Characteristics of News English
Week 3  International and Political News (1)
Week 4  International and Political News (2)
Week 5  Arts and Entertainment News (1)
Week 6  Arts and Entertainment News (2)
Week 7  Science and Technology News (1)
Week 8  Science and Technology News (2); Mid-term Exam
Week 9  English Proficiency Test
Week 10  Sports News (1)
Week 11  Sports News (2) 
Week 12  Business and Finance News (1)
Week 13  Business and Finance News (2)
Week 14  Health and Environment News (1)
Week 15  Health and Environment News (2)
Week 16  Review 
Week 17  Oral Presentations  
Week 18  Final Exam

* 本課程規劃為一學年上 / 下學期連續之課程
scorePolicy:
1. continuous assessment (attendance, participation, exercises and quizzes): 35%
2. oral presentations: 10%
3. mid-term and final exams: 35% 
4. one proficiency test: 20%
